headline.main: FOE'S SUBMARINES TEST MARINE LINES; One Driven Off by Shore Guns as It Tries to Attack Party on Trip Between Isles REPORTER'S LIFE EXCITING Boat Bound From Guadalcanal to Tulagi Breaks Down as Enemy Craft Appears

lead_paragraph: GUADALCANAL, Solomon Islands, Aug. 15 (Delayed) -News ghering hereabouts is no City Hall beat. The success of the Navykarine Corps operations has given us six islands to cover. That means open water and small boats, which in this area add up to a game of hide and seek with Japanese submarines.
abstract: 2d Lt H L Merillat on trip between isles
